Klear Kote PLUS, with UV Inhibitor   KKPLUS

NEW PRODUCT  2 Gallons Kit

High Gloss Epoxy Coating

Two Gallon Kit, (Contains 1 Gallon Resin, 1 Gallon Hardener.) 
Klear Kote PLUS Epoxy Coating is an clear, high gloss finishing epoxy.  Klear Kote PLUS has been formulated for improved UV resistance to reduce yellowing and surface degradation from UV exposure.  Ideal as a table top epoxy, bar top epoxy, art epoxy, and for home improvements, craft projects, and many other finishes.

entry.title: Mod Podge ® Do-It-Yourself Resin Kit - River - 25295E
entry.summary:
Vendor: Creative Wholesale
Type: Adhesives, Glue
Price: 31.66

Mod Podge ® Do-It-Yourself Resin Kit - River - 25295E

Please choose UPS ground or USPS retail ground only for this product.  See our terms and conditions for aerosols and ORM-D products.  This product is unable to ship priority mail or first class mail.

    • Create flowing resin art with the Mod Podge Do-it-Yourself Resin Coaster Kit in Blue and Gold. This versatile kit comes with everything you need to start creating coasters right away! Designed to work beautifully with the Mod Podge River Plaque sold separately. Kit includes a variety of quality supplies to get you started on your coasters and so many other resin projects. This kit includes a 2-part resin and hardener, two alcohol inks, four glitter packs, three stir sticks, two measuring cups, three mixing cups, one silicone coaster mold, and an instruction sheet. Simply mix an equal 1:1 ratio of each formula to make your projects come to life. Please note that the Mod Podge River Plaque is sold separately. Use this multi-faceted resin kit to seal, protect, or preserve your artwork or create one-of-a-kind jewelry pieces, home decor, and so much more. There are infinite possibilities when working with Mod Podge Resin! Mod Podge Resin dries to a beautiful hard, clear, high-gloss finish - perfect for embedding flowers or photos. Be sure to always follow all safety guidelines listed on the packaging and wear the proper PPE. Your project will have stunning character and charm when you craft with the Mod Podge Do-it-Yourself Resin Coaster Kit in Blue and Gold.

      Additional Item Details

      • Item #25295E
      • UPC #028995252952
      • Condition: New
      • Size: Set Includes: resin, hardener, mold, glitter pack, inks, stir sticks, plastic cups and instruction book

entry.title: Mod Podge ® Alcohol Ink Set - Princess, 2 pc. - 25290
entry.summary:
Vendor: Plaid
Type: Epoxy Resin
Price: 4.99

Mod Podge ® Alcohol Ink Set - Princess, 2 pc. - 25290

 Mod Podge Resin Alcohol Inks are ideal for adding color to any of your resin projects. This 2-piece set of alcohol inks for resin are sure to be a colorful addition to your resin supplies. Use these metallic colors with the Mod Podge Resin 2-Part Resin Kit to create stunning patterns and movement in your resin art. Each color is super-saturated for rich, vibrant hues throughout your resin projects. Every bottle of alcohol ink comes with a dropper tip perfect for easily adding color to specific parts of your creation. Use these alcohol inks to create unique jewelry pieces, coasters, home decor items, and more - the possibilities are endless with Mod Podge Alcohol Inks! Add a pop of color to your resin designs with Mod Podge Resin Alcohol Inks.

Additional Item Details

  • Item #25291
  • UPC #028995252914
  • Condition: New
  • Size: 2 pc. Set

entry.title: Famowood Glaze Coat Epoxy Coating One Gallon Kit 5050110
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eclectic Products
Type: Epoxy Resin, Art Resin
Price: 66.81

FAMOWOOD GLAZE COAT Epoxy Coating One Gallon Kit, 5050110

Kit contains 64 ounces Resin, 64 ounces Hardener.

Coverage  approximately 25.6 square feet

Application Instructions                       

SDS

Ultra Clear, High Gloss Finish.  A two part epoxy used on thousands of projects to achieve a high-gloss finish or where embedding or preservation are desired.  Coat, embed, and preserve Home Decor, Furniture, Jewelry, Craft and many more projects!  Use on wood, metal, rock/masonry, cloth, furniture, leather, pine cones, Styrfoam, seashells, decals, oil paints & more.  The perfect coating for Unicorn Spit.

This ultra-clear, high gloss finishing epoxy is ideal for home improvement and craft projects. FAMOWOOD Glaze Coat is a pour-on epoxy coating that can be used on most surfaces – rough or smooth, stained or painted. It's great for coating tables or bar tops, preserving photographs or imbedding decorative items. Just one coat equals 70 coats of varnish!

• Easy 1:1 mixing ratio
• Versatile – use on any non waxy material
• Self-leveling – minimal spreading required
• Indoor use
• Resists temperatures up to 120 °F

entry.title: Envirotex Lite Gallon Kit 02128
entry.summary:
Vendor: Environmental Technology
Type: Epoxy Resin, Art Resin
Price: 65.99

Envirotex Lite®, Gallon kit, Pour On High Gloss Finish

  (1/2 gallon resin, 1/2 gallon Hardener.) Item # 02128   $65.99 

Gallon Kit: Coverage: 32 square foot

 

Application Instructions         SDS for Hardener             SDS for Resin

 

Envirotex Lite is a water clear reactive polymer compound. It cures to a thick, glossy coating in about 8 hours at 70°F, and reaches full strength and toughness in about 48 hours. This durable, resilient material requires no polishing to produce a high gloss. One coat is all that is usually required for a deep attractive finish, however, two or more coats maybe applied one over the other by simply wiping the surface with a clean cloth and alcohol prior to re-coating.

Envirotex Lite is used as a table tops, bar tops, resin art, countertops and much more.   Envirotex Lite® is alcohol and heat resistant. Envirotex Lite®  Envirotex Lite is a bar top epoxy, table top epoxy, resin art epoxy, and much more . A Gallon Kit consists of 1/2 gallon of Resin and 1/2 gallon of Hardener, making a total of one gallon.

ORM-D, Consumer Commodity:      UPS GROUND SHIPMENTS, no additional shipping fees within the continental US, hazmat fees are added to all shipments to Alaska and Hawaii. 

For all AIR SHIPMENTS this item is considered a Hazardous Material.  In addition to regular Air Shipping  Fees, an Additional $35.00 UPS Hazmat shipping fee is added per box for all materials shipped.  THIS FEE IS NOT SHOWN ON ORDER CONFIRMATION, AND WILL BE ADDED TO THE SHIPPING CHARGES.

 See Terms and Conditions.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Environmental Technology
Type: Clear Casting Resin
Price: 66.99

Castin'Craft

Clear Polyester Casting Resin with Catalyst:

1 Gallon resin with 1 ounce catalyst

Resin casting is an exciting and fun craft that allows you to embed or encase almost any object in crystal clear plastic. Coins, shells, rocks, dried flowers, butterflies and insects are just a few of the examples of embedment possibilities. This convenient new package includes catalyst in a clear bubble top cap.

entry.title: EX-88 Epoxy Coating Two Gallon Kit 01188
entry.summary:
Vendor: Environmental Technology
Type: Epoxy Resin
Price: 110.99

EX-88 Epoxy Coating, Two Gallon Kit, (one gallon Resin, one gallon hardener)

EX-88 is an extremely clear, tough, high gloss surface coating formulated to produce a deep glass like appearance in a single layer on a sealed surface. EX-88 has an extended “open time” which allows up to 5 minutes in the mixing container at 70º F and up to one hour working time on the surface being coated.

Ex-88 is used for creating a deep high gloss coating on bar tops, table tops, plaques, and many other applications. 

EX-88 is waterproof, heat & alcohol resistant.

Coverage:       32 square feet per gallon of mixed product.

Application Instructions

Notice:   For Air Shipments, this product is classified as Hazardous.  Additional HazMat Fees apply.  This fee is in addition to the shipping fee shown at checkout, and will be added to your total .   See Terms and Conditions.  NO EXTRA HAZMAT SHIPPING CHARGE FOR GROUND UPS SHIPPING.

entry.title: EX-74 Epoxy resin for Resin Art Bars Tables 2 Gallon Kit $117.99
entry.summary:
Vendor: Environmental Technology
Type: Epoxy Resin, Art Resin
Price: 117.99

EX-74 Epoxy Coating.  Two Gallon Kit. (One gallon of Resin, One gallon of Hardener).

EX-74 is the preferred product for Resin Art, table tops, bar top, and counter tops.  and artifacts.  EX-74 is the art resin preferred product used by artists to provide a high gloss, glass like finish to their paintings.    EX-74 has been formulated for improved UV resistance to reduce yellowing and surface degradation from UV exposure.

EX-74 is an extremely clear, tough, high gloss surface coating formulated to produce deep glass like appearance in a single layer on a sealed surface. Two or more layers are often applied for added depth and protection. EX-74 has been formulated for improved UV resistance to reduce yellowing and surface degradation from UV exposure. EX-74 has an extended "open time" which allows up to 5 minutes in the mixing container at 70º F and up to one hour working time on the surface being coated. EX-74 is waterproof, heat & alcohol resistant.

Coverage:  Two gallons will cover approximately 64 square feet @ 1/16" inch.

Notice:   For Air Shipments, this product is classified as Hazardous.  Additional HazMat Fees apply.  This fee is in addition to the shipping fee shown at checkout, and will be added to your total .   See Terms and Conditions.  No extra charge for ground shipments

 

EX-74 Application Instruction        

EX-74 Concrete Countertop Application Instructions
